name: Nuclear Crises
description:
Made  for   [ Godot Wild Jam #49 ]

KNOWN BUGS / PROBLEMS

-Your Hp, suit state, bullets etc resets after you change scene

-Some mistakes in enemy AI

NOTES

-This game could have more things, but because of the errors and lack of motivation i didnt add that much, you can read more about this in the end of the game

CONTROLS

LEFT A / LEFT ARROW RIGHT D / RIGHT ARROW JUMP W / SPACE INTERACTE ATTACK Z/

CREDITS

-ART: Pixel Frog - itch.io (with Changes)

-CODE: EDRO - itch.io

-MUSIC: SpaghettDoggo#3190 (Discord)

PLATFORM

-You can Play This on Browser
